summary: Football game project with added visual assets request.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo mid-kick (ronaldo-kick.dim_768x768.png)
- Stylized illustration of a football goalpost/net (goalpost.dim_768x512.png)
- Stylized illustration of a football in motion with motion blur/trail (football-motion.dim_512x512.png)
- Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo celebrating after scoring (ronaldo-celebrate.dim_768x768.png)
- Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo reacting to a miss (ronaldo-miss.dim_768x768.png)

existing_features.title: Add new static images to the Cute Football mini-game to depict Cristiano Ronaldo kicking a ball into a goalpost, and update the mini-game UI to display these images during gameplay (idle/aiming, kick action, and goal/miss result states).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add pictures/images to the football game showing Ronaldo kicking goals into the goalpost
